articles.author: Mais Abdou, M.D.
articles.title: 6 tips for living with COPD - Mayo Clinic Health System
articles.description: COPD, a chronic inflammatory lung disease most often caused by long-term smoking, is a leading cause of disability and death in the U.S. Learn strategies to cope with COPD and slow lung damage.
articles.content: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, or COPD, is a leading cause of disability and death in the U.S., according to the American Lung Association. More than 12.5 million people in the U.S. have a di… [+4842 chars]
